name: kapew
description:
Controls [Z][X][C][V][SPACE] or [A][S][D][F][SPACE] or [1][2][3][4][SPACE]

press any of the controls to start

Destroy the alien explosives when their charge is near depleted.

I whipped this up over the last week and have taken it as far as i am willing to at the moment. and it's always better to publish than rubbish so here it is. just hit the enemy explosives when they are in the minimum damage zone indicated by the horizontal white line and that's really all there is to it. the game has 15 levels all of increasing difficulty.
